    • Field Detail

      • upgrades

        private static java.util.Map<SteamToolUpgrade,net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation[]> upgrades
        Map of the upgrades and their according texture locations. This is used primarily for model rendering, but could be potentially useful in any case where every single upgrade is needed (or its textures).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ToolUpgradeRegistry

        public ToolUpgradeRegistry()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(SteamToolUpgrade upgrade)
        Registers an SteamToolUpgrade to the upgrades map.
        Parameters:
        upgrade - The upgrade to register. Uses SteamToolUpgrade.getBaseIcon() to determine the locations to register. For universal upgrades (SteamToolUpgrade.isUniversal() returns true), it will use Drill0, Drill1, Axe0, Axe1, Shovel0, and Shovel1 accordingly. Otherwise, it will use Drill, Axe, or Shovel according to what is returned by SteamToolUpgrade.getToolSlot().

      • getResources

        public static java.util.Set<SteamToolUpgrade> getUpgrades()
